testcase.name: Addition
testcase.system-out: &amp#27;[1mScenario:&amp#27;[22m Addition &amp#27;[90m# src/test/resources/features/arithmetic.feature:3&amp#27;[39m Given numbers: a=10, b=5 &amp#27;[32m✔&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1mGiven &amp#27;[22mI have numbers &amp#27;[1m10&amp#27;[22m and &amp#27;[1m5&amp#27;[22m&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[90m# automation.steps.ArithmeticSteps.i_have_numbers(int,int)&amp#27;[39m Computed addition: 15 &amp#27;[32m✔&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1mWhen &amp#27;[22mI add them&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[90m# automation.steps.ArithmeticSteps.i_add_them()&amp#27;[39m Verify expected=15, actual=15 PASS &amp#27;[32m✔&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1mThen &amp#27;[22mresult should be &amp#27;[1m15&amp#27;[22m&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[90m# automation.steps.ArithmeticSteps.result_should_be(int)&amp#27;[39m

testcase.name: Multiplication
testcase.system-out: &amp#27;[1mScenario:&amp#27;[22m Multiplication &amp#27;[90m# src/test/resources/features/arithmetic.feature:8&amp#27;[39m Given numbers: a=6, b=7 &amp#27;[32m✔&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1mGiven &amp#27;[22mI have numbers &amp#27;[1m6&amp#27;[22m and &amp#27;[1m7&amp#27;[22m&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[90m# automation.steps.ArithmeticSteps.i_have_numbers(int,int)&amp#27;[39m Computed multiplication: 42 &amp#27;[32m✔&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1mWhen &amp#27;[22mI multiply them&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[90m# automation.steps.ArithmeticSteps.i_multiply_them()&amp#27;[39m Verify expected=42, actual=42 PASS &amp#27;[32m✔&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1mThen &amp#27;[22mresult should be &amp#27;[1m42&amp#27;[22m&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[90m# automation.steps.ArithmeticSteps.result_should_be(int)&amp#27;[39m

testcase.name: Division
testcase.system-out: &amp#27;[1mScenario:&amp#27;[22m Division &amp#27;[90m# src/test/resources/features/arithmetic.feature:13&amp#27;[39m Given numbers: a=20, b=4 &amp#27;[32m✔&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1mGiven &amp#27;[22mI have numbers &amp#27;[1m20&amp#27;[22m and &amp#27;[1m4&amp#27;[22m&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[90m# automation.steps.ArithmeticSteps.i_have_numbers(int,int)&amp#27;[39m Computed division: 5 &amp#27;[32m✔&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1mWhen &amp#27;[22mI divide them&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[90m# automation.steps.ArithmeticSteps.i_divide_them()&amp#27;[39m Verify expected=5, actual=5 PASS &amp#27;[32m✔&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1mThen &amp#27;[22mresult should be &amp#27;[1m5&amp#27;[22m&amp#27;[39m &amp#27;[90m# automation.steps.ArithmeticSteps.result_should_be(int)&amp#27;[39m
